channel.title: Voyager News on Voyager Internet Ltd.
channel.description: Recent content in Voyager News on Voyager Internet Ltd.

item.title: Voyager establishes a Point of Presence in Sydney
item.description: Voyager has established a new Point of Presence (POP) in Sydney that provides dedicated backhaul to Australia via diverse Trans-Tasman undersea cables, offering high capacity and redundancy to connected services between Australia and New Zealand.

item.title: Voyager establishes Network Operations Centre in new Albany office
item.description: Exciting times at Voyager as the company celebrates its hard work and continued growth with the opening of a Network Operation Centre (NOC).

item.title: Voyager celebrates 10 years of providing connectivity for Kiwis
item.description: This year marks Voyager Internet’s 10th birthday, and the company is proudly celebrating a decade of serving New Zealand homes and businesses with premium broadband, voice, and domain name and hosting solutions.

item.title: Voyager Delivers the Message with SMS Text Solution
item.description: From internal staff and emergency communications to engaging with and retaining customers, one of the best ways to get a message across fits right in the palm of your hand.

item.title: Gaming lounge powers up business with Voyager fibre broadband
item.description: Kiwi business owner Callum Jennings is encouraging more New Zealand businesses to make the switch to fibre broadband after experiencing a “monumental increase in speed, significantly lower latency, and greater connection stability” at his own gaming lounge in Auckland.

item.title: Voyager completes upgrade of core network
item.description: Voyager Internet has recently completed a 100 Gigabit upgrade of its core data network.

item.title: Voyager Media Awards 2019
item.description: We rolled out the blue carpet again this year for the 2019 Voyager Media Awards!

item.title: We're taking care of business, now 7 days a week
item.description: We’re already chuffed to say that 80% of our support calls are answered within 60 seconds, and from 1st July 2019, we’re excited to announce that our business support hours are now 8am to 10pm, 7 days a week.
